class.name: OpenXRSpatialQueryResultData
class.brief_description: Object for storing the main query result data.
class.description: Object for storing the main query result data when calling [method OpenXRSpatialEntityExtension.query_snapshot]. This must always be the first component requested.

method.name: get_capacity
method.description: Returns the number of entities that were retrieved.

method.name: get_entity_id
method.description: Returns the entity id ([code]XrSpatialEntityIdEXT[/code]) for the entity at this [param index].

method.name: get_entity_state
method.description: Returns the entity state for the entity at this [param index].
